topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559f3b7363687207c7001793#post_559f3b7363687207c7001793

_Laika_ is the story of the first dog sent into space by Russia. It's fun, insightful, and really, really sad.

!https://d.gr-assets.com/books/1317066931l/1641695.jpg!
topics.author: 5041b54f7f123b77af00a442

topics.body:
"@And Brother I Hurt People":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559f3ba36368727068001323#post_559f3ba36368727068001323
It was just brilliantly done. One of the few zombie things where the zombies weren't dumb and stupid and ate things.
They were pretty much just people, except they weren't alive anymore. That was pretty much it. They spoke well, had emotion, and each had their own thought-out story.

topics.body:
!http://www.readingreview.com/web/books_babymouse.jpg!

This used to be my shit in elementary/middle school.

A comic series following the exploits of Babymouse, who tries desperately to fit in with her popular peers while trying to maintain who she really is inside.

Not really _good_, probably, but a fond memory.

!http://mediamacaroni.com/wp-content/uploads/2008/07/babymousefighter.jpg!

!http://www.juniorlibraryguild.com/images/9780375967801/InteriorArt/9780375967801-babymouse_zoom.jpg!

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559f3c306368727068001405#post_559f3c306368727068001405
Yes you are correct, but monster musume thing is about being sexy and funny so it's kind of hard not to talk about it without showing the sexy/funny parts.
And NO! Don't just watch it because we talked about it, I don't want you to feel forced and stuff. You don't have to like are stuff, but you gotta understand we don't like everything you do.
I just wish you wouldn't  just bash it because of those reasons, we don't do it to you.

Ya know
"If you don't have anything nice to say, don't say anything at all"

I'll admit
I could care less about most of your likings but I'm not going to say it every time you post those things
topics.author: 51a2815b7f123be59500049b
